1.) Break-Up Gone Wrong.

You are at age 22. You had been in a relationship with Katie since middle school. Over the past few months Katie had been pressing you to marry her and have babies with her. Afraid of such a commitment, you decide to break up with her. Unfortunately for you, Katie retaliates by using (shrinking technology, magic, etc.) to shrink you down to baby size, and keep you as her living baby doll.


2.) Alien ABDLuction


You are an astronaut that crash lands on a strange planet inhabited by giant immortal amazonian alien women with advanced technology. After you get captured by one, you find out that this species captures non-suspecting humans from earth, and keep them as their pets. It is the social norm for their species to treat their human pets as their own infant children. You must escape this planet and find a way home, but how?...


3.) Cheater Cheater


You have been married to a very wealthy woman named Betty for 10 years. Like many marriages, tensions began to grow high, as Betty begins to nag you about having a child. You’ve refused to have a kid, and have gone through great lengths to make sure that you got your way. In addition to this, you decide to to cheat on your wife to a much more attractive woman. Your wife finds out and goes nuts! She shrinks you down to baby size out of anger. She uses her resources to divorce you, make you unemployed, and adopt you as her baby boy. You now must escape your crazy wife from humiliating you and tormenting you.

4.) Bewitching Burglary

You are a thief who sneaks into peoples homes and takes their valuables. One night, you sneak into a house, and find a glowing jade amulet in the shape of a pacifier on a stone statue. You take it, but suddenly shrink down to the size of a toddler. From the shadows emerges a sexy evil witch, who sentences you to an eternity as her little diapered slave, forced to be her plaything solely for her amusement.






Choose your story.

15.content:
1.) Redneck Momma

Your car breaks down in the middle of the woods trying to take a short cut. With no signal, you decide to exit the woods on foot. After miles of walking, you find a a clearing with an enormous farm, with pigs, chickens, and cows. As you grow closer to the farm, you realize all of the animals and the farm house are gargantuan in size. Before you decide to leave, a delusional 20 foot tall farmer named Delilah captures you, and raises you as her baby. After losing her husband and baby in a horrible fire, Delilah is determined to make sure that you don’t make it home.


2.) Guantanamo Baby

You are a convicted felon, who has been sentenced to a prison placed in the Bermuda Triangle. Criminals from all over the world serve life sentences in this prison, but no one is sure what happens to them once they are inside. You find out that an experimental shrinking technology is used on all prisoners, shrinking them down just knee high of the gorgeous entirely female prison guards. Every prisoner is locked up in nursery themed prison cells, and spends the rest of their days living in total humiliation, undergoing lengthy torture sessions with the guards. You must escape this prison at all costs, before you loose your sanity.


3.) Big Fat Momma’s Boy

Your dysmorphopic girlfriend undergoes an experimental diet, and nags you into doing it with her, despite not needing it. This diet surprisingly encourages her to consume massive quantities of this special “dietetic” food of an unknown origin. While you begin to loose a little bit of weight, your girlfriend begins to grow even fatter, and much taller. As the time goes on, your gf gains an additional 2 feet tall and an astounding 250 pounds, while you have lost 4 feet in height, and lost 150 pounds. Her maternal instincts now triggered by a suspicious amount of hormone inducing medication that is required for her diet, your girlfriend forces you to play a rough game of house, and you are the baby...

4.) Superman’s Dimensional Detour

You are the Man of Steel, and you have been zapped by a mysterious device created by Lex Luthor. You find yourself adrift within a sea of endless possibilities. You are pulled into a inter dimensional current, and brought into a completely different reality. You find yourself in an issue of “Superman’s Girlfriend Lous Lane.” A reality much weirder and more cartoony than your home world. You find yourself weakened by an asteroid laced with a strange rainbow Kryptonite. This causes you to shrink down to the size of a baby. With your powers completely gone, you are found by this Earth’s Lous Lane, who is completely demented, and hellbent on convincing you to marry her. After refusing, and trying to explain what hard happened, the psychotic woman doesn’t believe you, and decides to teach you a lesson, and treat you like her baby.
